title: "Taiwan's Touche Solutions taps into Japanese robotics with tactile tech"
excerpt: "The company has developed over 20 specifications of tactile skins and made its debut at the Tokyo International Robot Exhibition (iREX) in late 2023. The company's appearance at the exhibition attracted the attention of local Japanese robotics companies and secured long-term orders from multiple Japanese robotic arm manufacturers."
